com.example.booksies.model.database

Class FirestoreHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.booksies.model.database.FirestoreHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CRUD

    public class FirestoreHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements CRUD
    Firestore handler is a class designed to handle documents obtained from firebase. The class models the documents into objects and arraylists to be used in various other sections.
